transArray.content:
It is very close to the airport, and the airport special line takes the Sanyuanqiao subway station. Come out and walk for a few minutes. very convenient.
The decoration is more in line with the needs of young people and business trips. After all, each room is only a dozen square meters.
Breakfast: The time seems to be 11 o'clock or 12 o'clock. Quite good! Perfect for a brunch if you're catching a flight. As for the rich breakfast, there are freshly made pancakes/grilled cold noodles, and noodles. Regular bread, cakes, vegetables, porridge, bacon, fruit, yogurt, coffee, tea are available.
In the evening, there are professional singers and a small bar in the restaurant.
